document.full_text: a tv talent show star plays dorothy in the staged version of "the wizard of oz," while "spelling bee" looks at competitive culture and "drowning on dry land" pits a loser against a children's clown.
document.title: theater review: on london stage, it's all about winning
lines_and_colors: a tv talent show star plays dorothy in the staged version of "the wizard of oz," while "spelling bee" looks at competitive culture and "drowning on dry land" pits a loser against a children's clown.
